title: Brainrot Trivia Bonus Game

summary.roundStructure: 6 quick multiple-choice questions followed by an optional grand question.

rewards.perfectRoundBonus: If all 6 answers are correct, award +1 coin (7 total).

stars.bonusRoundStar: Each bonus round completion awards 1 star.
stars.threeStarChest: Collecting 3 stars grants a chest consumable at level end for bonus.
stars.deathWithThreeStars: Auto-retry level and reset stars to 0.

flow: Run 7-second timer per question; check answer or timeout.
Accumulate hidden coins; reveal only after the 6-question sequence ends.
If perfect round, add 1 bonus coin and unlock grand question.
Resolve grand question for chest reward (10 coins + 1UP) if correct.
Award star for the bonus round; grant chest + 1UP when stars reach 3.
